      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean inValidTime()
      Verify if there is enough time to go to the last added node to the path and go back to depot taking in count the total distance traveled so far and the battery level that the car has
      static boolean isHamiltonianPath()
      Verify if the last added node to the path is the depot
      static boolean isValidPath()
      Verify if the path so far has the same node two times, excluding stations because stations can be visited many times
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main function that read the file and start the looking for a solution based on that input file
      static int minInDistance​(java.util.ArrayList<Successor> currentNodeSuccessors)
      Iterate through the successors of the node that is currently being analized, and selects the closest node, but giving priority to clients without a visit.

      Reads the footer of the input file

      Reads the header of the input file

      Iterate through the successors of the given node and adds to the path the one that is valid node, and calls it recursively

      Check if the path with all routes found has a client visited two times, ignoring stations and depot node

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main function that read the file and start the looking for a solution based on that input file
        Parameters:

      • TSP

        public static void TSP()

      • testPath

        public static void testPath​(int currentNode)
        Iterate through the successors of the given node and adds to the path the one that is valid node, and calls it recursively
        Parameters:
        currentNode - id of the node that is going to be analyzed

      • inValidTime

        public static boolean inValidTime()
        Verify if there is enough time to go to the last added node to the path and go back to depot taking in count the total distance traveled so far and the battery level that the car has
        Returns:
        true if there is enough time, false in other case

      • isHamiltonianPath

        public static boolean isHamiltonianPath()
        Verify if the last added node to the path is the depot
        Returns:
        true if the last added node is the depot, false in other case

      • minInDistance

        public static int minInDistance​(java.util.ArrayList<Successor> currentNodeSuccessors)
        Iterate through the successors of the node that is currently being analized, and selects the closest node, but giving priority to clients without a visit. After selecting the closest node it calculates if the car has enough battery to visit the client and go back depot, if that is not true, try if the car has enough battert to visit the client a go to an station, if that is not true, that is an invalid node and it will return -1
        Parameters:
        currentNodeSuccessors - list of successors of the node that is currently being analyzed
        Returns:
        the id of the closest node to the current node

      • isValidPath

        public static boolean isValidPath()
        Verify if the path so far has the same node two times, excluding stations because stations can be visited many times
        Returns:
        false if there is a client visited two times, true in other case

      • trySolution

        public static boolean trySolution​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> path)
        Check if the path with all routes found has a client visited two times, ignoring stations and depot node
        Parameters:
        path - Super path that contain all the paths found
        Returns:
        false if there is a client visited two times, true in other case

      • readHeader

        public static void readHeader​(java.util.Scanner reader)
        Reads the header of the input file
        Parameters:
        reader - scanner already initialized with the input file

      • readFooter

        public static void readFooter​(java.util.Scanner reader)
        Reads the footer of the input file
        Parameters:
        reader - scanner already initialized with the input file
